name: Harald Ertl
introduction: Harald Ertl (August 31 1948 - April 7 1982) was an Austrian driver and motorsports journalist. He entered 28 races, driving in 19 of them, for Hesketh, Ensign and ATS. Ertl is best remembered as one of the four drivers who came to Niki Lauda's aid at the Nrburgring in 1976.
